firm_information.name: GRANT / POST PROPERTIES
firm_information.location: 1330 Wirt Rd. Suite E Houston, TX 77055

house_listing.house_description: Charming historical home***Wrap around porch***Recent plumbing, wiring***8 ton A/C***11 foot ceilings***Super 2nd floor garage apartment currently renting for $375.00 mo.***Stainedglass windows***Den overlooks beautiful front yard. This home is featured in Houston Home and Garden magazine***Fire place heatolator***Recessed lighting***Pine floors***

highlights.item: Exceptional location in historic Houston Heights
Minutes from most major bus. districts
